ddcmAlertMessages: NEOZEP TABLET (based on the ingredient ASCORBIC ACID) is contraindicated when hemolytic anemia from pyruvate kinase and G6PD deficiencies, a condition related to G6PD Deficiency, exists.
NEOZEP TABLET (based on the ingredient SALICYLATES) is contraindicated when hemolytic anemia from pyruvate kinase and G6PD deficiencies, a condition related to G6PD Deficiency, exists.

drugAllergyAlertMessages: The use of NEOZEP TABLET may result in an allergic reaction based on a reported history of allergy to PARACETAMOL in which ALLERGIC CONTACT DERMATITIS was experienced.
The use of NEOZEP TABLET may result in an allergic reaction based on a reported history of allergy to NSAID in which ANGIOEDEMA;  ASTHMA was experienced.
